type: NetApp Data Storage Maintenance and Support or equivalent for Department of National Defence
full_summary:
### NetApp Data Storage Maintenance and Support Solicitation

#### Solicitation Overview

Shared Services Canada invites qualified contractors to bid on a solicitation for NetApp Data Storage Maintenance and Support or equivalent for the Department of National Defence (DND). This solicitation is a request for proposals and has an expiry date of **July 30, 2024**.

The solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Solicitation Details

The solicitation number is **SSC-24-00026938:T**, and the solicitation closing date is **July 30, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT**. The solicitation was published on **July 11, 2024**, and a solicitation amendment was added on **July 26, 2024**.

The expected contract start date and end date are **None**.

The solicitation is for the purchase of NetApp data storage maintenance and support services for the DND. The contractor will be required to provide services for the option year.

#### Registration and Bidding

To register and bid on the solicitation, contractors must create an account on the SSC P2P portal. Upon registration, bidders will be able to access the solicitation, submit a response, and receive updates and amendments.

To register, please visit [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) and click "Register Now".

#### Contact Information

For more information about the solicitation, please contact **Javier Ventura** by phone at **343-576-9329** or email at None.

### Attachment

The solicitation document and its attachments can be found on the SSC P2P portal. The attachment URLs are:

* [https://sscp2pspc
